name: frameworkthreejs

scripts.setup: npm run install_three && npm run setupDirectory && npm run addStyle && npm run move
scripts.setupDirectory: mkdir src\css src\js src\models src\textures src\framework
scripts.addStyle: (echo body { & type tab.txt & echo background-color: white; & type tab.txt & echo margin : 0; & echo })> src\css\style.css
scripts.move: move framework.js src\framework\framework.js && move CTABanner.js src\framework\CTABanner.js && move createScene.js src\framework\createScene.js && move table.js src\framework\table.js && move roof.jpg src\textures\roof.jpg && move wall.jpg src\textures\wall.jpg && move wood_floor.jpg src\textures\wood_floor.jpg && move main.js src\js\main.js
scripts.initialState: move src\framework\framework.js framework.js && move src\framework\CTABanner.js CTABanner.js && move src\framework\createScene.js createScene.js && move src\framework\table.js table.js && move src\textures\roof.jpg roof.jpg && move src\textures\wall.jpg wall.jpg && move src\textures\wood_floor.jpg wood_floor.jpg && move src\js\main.js main.js && npm run delete
scripts.delete: rmdir /s /q src && rmdir /s /q node_modules && del package-lock.json

author: Kishan Turpin <kishan.turpin@gmail.com>, Dylan Malaussena
description: This is a Three.js framework for creating 3D web application for TerraNumerica.
